attributes.additional_details:
We are calling for the dismissal and prosecution of Maria Miller - Culture Secretary  for falsely claiming expenses. We are also calling for her to pay back all of the money she falsely claimed.

Mrs Miller over-claimed by £45,000 for expenses towards mortgage interest payments and council tax on the family home in London on the basis of the rules that were in place at the time.

If this was any 'ordinary person' they would be prosecuted and probably imprisoned and they would certainly lose their job.

rejection.details: Expenses are a matter for the Parliamentary authorities.
